column22:
long-description:"Full Metal Panic! Fight! Who Dares Wins
The following items are the Early Purchase Bonus:

■Arm Slave '3 Special Weapons Set'
-Boxer-2 76mm Shotgun (AP)
-ASG96-B Custom 57mm Smoothbore Gun
-GRAW-X Monomolecular Cutter (LD Prototype)

■Other Special Weapons
-Special Weapon Pallas AS Flamethrower
-Special Weapon Styx AS Flamethrower
-Special Weapon Versile II Custom

※Digital Version downloaded between 31 May 2018 to 27 June 2018 (tentative) has the Early Purchase Bonus included.
※Early Purchase Bonus may be made available at a later date.

■Monumental Sci-Fi Action Series Full Metal Panic! debuts as a standalone game for home consoles on the PlayStation®4!
The battle surrounding the Whispered finally reaches its climax―― Charge onto the battlefield in this tactical simulation RPG!!
Mithril
column23: the strongest armed organization in the world
column25:
the organization pulling strings in the shadows. The grand battle between the humanoid weapons called Arm Slaves comes alive in this simulation RPG!
Brought to you by B.B.Studios
column26:
the same company behind the Super Robot Wars series.
In order to bring back Chidori Kaname
column28:
our hero Sousuke Sagara sets off on a lonely battle.

■Direct Arm Slave battles with the Tactical Phase!
The Tactical Phase shows the intense AS battles on various terrains. It has various features such as AS weapon selection by classification
column30: and compensating for low hit chance with many hits. Instead of turns
column31: this game has a Move Order
column32:
affected by the total weight of weapons and the preceding action. Grasp the key to victory by choosing the right weapons!

■Experience the story with Scenario Phase
column33:
directed by author Shouji Gatou!
Mithril suffers a devastating blow when Amalgam finally decides to get serious. The story surrounding the Whispered is thrown into motion. New battlefields
column36:
brought to life with a wealth of character voices and event CG. Choices lead to unknown developments――

©BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Inc.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to SEN Terms of Service and User Agreement."
